description: This file implements a registration page component for a Next.js web application, allowing users to create an account by providing their name, email, and password. It manages form state, handles submission via an API call, and redirects upon success.

methods.name: RegisterPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering a user registration form and handling account creation.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function to handle form submission, call registration API, update status, and handle redirection.

calls: apiFetch('/auth/register', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ name, email, password }) })
